listing.listing_description:
It doesn’t get any better than a beachfront villa with an amazing ocean view, and Villa Vedas designers appreciate that fact too. With an ocean-facing, unobstructed twenty-two-meter span, the ocean view is absolutely spectacular from nearly every interior space. The Sea, the sand, and the sun are harmoniously integrated into this luxurious five-bedroom. You’re sure to fall in love with Bali’s gorgeous sunsets, lush palm trees, and relaxing beach atmosphere on your next Luxury Retreats vacation.

What sets Villa Vedas apart from the rest is its customizability. Architects make use of frameless Hafele glass walls throughout the entire house, allowing guests to fully open the walls and living spaces to the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight, or close spaces off to enjoy the air conditioning. Open concept design and spacious interior areas make Vedas a great spot for hosting, as does its bar, sound system, indoor and outdoor dining for twenty, and free-flowing environment. Eclectic works of art, designer furniture, and high-end electronics are Vedas decor. Plenty of rich wood tones give the villa a warm, relaxing vibe, while white walls and stone flooring set an elegant tone, making Vedas a dynamic vacation destination.

Outside, Vedas has an amazing terrace with lots of space for guests to socialize in a large group, or break-off for some secluded alone time. There are two swimming pools, lots of sun loungers, a barbecue, and an outdoor sound system. And, of course, there’s the beautiful beachfront and ocean view.

Bali has plenty of beautiful beachfront to explore up and down its coast. With thirty-kilometres you’ll find Belong, Echo, and Canggu Beaches, all great spots to spend a sunny afternoon. If you’re looking for something more adventurous, visit Bali Safari and Marine Park to experience what life is like for the creatures that inhabit the area. Bali’s Treetop Adventure Park is another exciting place to observe the local environment and perfect if you’re traveling with kids.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sleek modern style is rivaled only by dramatic ocean views at Denning St. Revel in the cool contemporary luxury of this four-bedroom Sydney vacation rental—and take advantage of its location in the Coogee area to visit nearby beaches and attractions on a holiday with up to twelve friends or family members.

This beautifully designed residence sits amid private grounds with landscaped gardens, a heated pool, hot tub and plenty of loungers. Serve dinner from the barbecue at an al-fresco dining table for eight, then finish the evening with local wine on the rooftop terrace or a quiet night inside in front of the cable TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.

A slide-away glass wall brings the ocean views into the villa’s open-concept great room. The clean, mod-inspired lines of the fully equipped kitchen and dining area are balanced by soft textures and a generous sectional in the sitting area. A separate TV lounge is tucked behind the kitchen, and there’s another sitting area that looks out onto the pool area.

Denning St has two bedrooms with queen beds: one master suite with an en-suite bathroom, and one that shares access to a hall bathroom. There are also two children’s rooms, each with a double bed, that share access to a hall bathroom. Larger parties can make use of a twin trundle bed and a sofa bed as well.

You can see the ocean from the villa, of course, but even better is getting into the water at one of the tidal pools. The nearest is tiny Ivor Rowe Rockpool, just a 5-minute walk from Denning St, but heritage-listed Wylie’s Baths is also well worth a visit. Spend a sunny day on relaxed, family-friendly Coogee Beach and a honeymoon-worthy evening with your sweetheart at one of the waterfront cafes. If you’d like to see more of the city, attractions like the Royal Botanic Gardens and the iconic Sydney Opera House are only a short drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched upon the rocky cliffs of Uluwatu in Bali, Indonesia’s most culturally distinct island, Villa Santai Sorga provides luxurious accommodations for those seeking the road less traveled. Resembling the hacienda-style of Spanish America, this vacation home is surrounded by elysian gardens and has space for groups of up to ten in its five sleek guest suites, as well as a plethora of high-end creature comforts. From here, the whole of Bali and its many points of interest can be effortlessly accessed, which Villa Santai Sorga with its staff will help facilitate.

The amenities are equally distributed among the outdoor and indoor. Features include an amazing infinity swimming pool, two lounges, a cliff-edge balé and manicured lawns. Guests are encouraged to stay outdoors and take in as much of the beautiful Balinese environment as possible. Indoors, the villa is replete with luxury comforts including the latest in home entertainment, sound systems, satellite television and access to Wi-Fi.

Built over two stories, Villa Santai Sorga features both casual and formal living/dining areas to suit any mood. Chic designer furniture is found everywhere in the home, largely smooth leather with comfy cushions and elegant tables that make even casual hangouts a little more memorable. The kitchen leaves nothing to be desired as it is fully-equipped with modern appliances keeping both guests and the chef utterly satisfied.

Simple elegance accented by light shades of calming blues accurately describes the five en-suite guest bedrooms. The massive master suite takes up the whole first floor of the main villa and offers a private verandah. The remaining four rooms are located in buildings along the path to the main swimming pool and each have canopy-style king beds and many amenities including a mini bar, air conditioning and entertainment center.

Villa Santai Sorga is placed near everything a young-at-heart traveler would want to see and experience in Bali. The limestone cliffs of Uluwatu provide many resort facilities and restaurants, but just a few steps away resides a whole world of exciting adventure. For instance, the nearby beach of Pantai Selatan Gau offers scenic views and excellent surfing. And just a little further away, the New Kuta Golf Course has received Indonesian-wide recognition as a leading spot for teeing off. Come unwind in beautiful Bali!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: The Ungasan Clifftop Resort is located approximately 15 kms south of Ngurah Rai International Airport in an area commonly referred to as ‘The Bukit’. The resort is located on the southernmost tip of the island of Bali, perched high above the Indian ocean on the white limestone cliffs of Uluwatu.

Selatan Restaurant - Perched cliff edge, Selatan Restaurant offers a sophisticated setting in which to enjoy exquisitely prepared dishes complimented by an extensive wine list that will satisfy the most discerning palates.

Sundays Beach Club - Peak over the Uluwatu Cliff Edge and stare in amazement at your first glimpse of the beautiful turquoise Indian Ocean below which makes the stunning landscape for Sundays Beach Club. The 180 meters white sandy beach is accessed by an inclinator that will carry you down the sheer drop of the cliff face providing the perfect backdrop for spectacular photo opportunities.

Laze away the day in the sun enjoying the cool tunes of our resident DJ and the service from our fun & friendly Balinese staff. For the more active take a kayak or stand up paddle board out for a ride. When the tide pulls low the rock pools and crystal clear lagoon are perfect for swimming and snorkeling.
Once you have worked up an appetite in the water, step into the open air bamboo pavilion where a casual yet classy setting awaits you.

Sundays’ beach restaurant menu boasts a well-balanced mix of local, international and fusion cuisine. The Sundays Beach Club mantra is ''Simple Food”, done exceptionally well'' and we do that by starting with only the freshest and best quality ingredients.
Sundays Beach Club provides an experience like no other in Bali. All who visit this piece of paradise are in awe of its beauty, they leave relaxed, sun kissed and dreaming of when they will return.

Weddings, Celebrations & Events - The Ungasan Clifftop Resort has nine superb Venues for a romantic wedding on the white sandy beach or a private ceremony in your own villa with uninterrupted views of the ocean. It is also the ultimate corporate event venue and is ideal for smaller groups and even for exclusive use. Whether you fancy a fabulous soiree on the cliff edge or something more intimate in the private villas, the staff can help create your perfect celebration in style.

listing.listing_description:
Located within the prestigious Mauna Kea Resort, on Hawaii’s Big Island, this luxurious five bedroom is the perfect tropical getaway for a group of ten. Just five minutes from the beach, this ocean view villa enjoys quick and easy access to the ocean and all of the resort’s amenities and attractions. With an incredible lagoon style backyard, you and your guests are sure to fall in love with Fairway North within seconds of arrival.

Displaying all of Hawaii’s trademark style, Fairway North is decorated for breezy beach relaxation with plenty of soothing cream tones, teak and cherry wood, rugged stone features, and vibrant floral patterns. Designer furniture and locally produced works of art are thoughtfully placed throughout the villa’s incredibly spacious interior, making use of its open concept layout to promote a social atmosphere. In the kitchen, you’ll find thick granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. And, all of five of Fairway North’s bedrooms come with ensuite bathrooms, the master also features a jetted tub.

Fairway North’s backyard is a dream. This tropical oasis enjoys privacy provided palm trees and lush greenery, and although the property is quite secluded, the ocean view is never compromised. The lagoon style features beautiful rock features, a swim-up bar, and a waterfall. Beyond the waterfall’s refreshing stream, you’ll find the rejuvenating hot tub grotto, perfect for enjoying late night cocktails and the company of good friends and loved ones. Back inside, you’ll appreciate the villa tech features, Wi-Fi, Smart TV, and a Sonos sound system. And, at dinner, you’ll have the choice between the formal dining area inside or the alfresco set on the terrace.

There are plenty of great opportunities to get out and explore the Big Island’s beautiful scenery, in and around the resort. Nearby, guests of Fairway North #1 may choose to receive full privileges at both the Mauna Kea Beach Hotel and the Hapuna Beach Prince Hotel for an additional fee paid directly to the resort. Whale watching, hiking, and water sports are all trendy activities on the Kohala Coast and highly recommended for nature lovers. If there’s a golfer in the group, Mauna Kea Resort’s oceanside course is just five minutes from home. And, the resort’s pristine, white sand beach is just five minutes as well.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
